mapper.sql: bhstr.ht_sample_transition_rule_id, bhstr.sample_transition_rule_id, bhstr.sample_transition_rule_code, bhstr.sample_transition_rule_desc, bhstr.org_id, bhstr.remark, bhstr.`status`, bhstr.create_user_id, bhstr.create_time, bhstr.modified_user_id, bhstr.modified_time, bhstr.is_delete
mapper.select:
select , su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, bo.organization_name FROM base_ht_sample_transition_rule AS bhstr LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON bhstr.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sus ON bhstr.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON bhstr.org_id = bo.organization_id
and date_format(bhstr.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and bhstr.sample_transition_rule_code like CONCAT('%', #{sampleTransitionRuleCode}, '%')
and bhstr.sample_transition_rule_desc like CONCAT('%', #{sampleTransitionRuleDesc}, '%')
and bhstr.org_id=#{orgId}
order by create_time desc
